prompt: Create a Help Center page with a professional corporate theme. Use a light gray background (#ECEFF1) for the Scaffold. Display a 'Help Center' title at the top in bold navy blue (#0D47A1) with a font size of 26. Add a subtitle in dark gray (#455A64) below it. Include a search bar with a white background (#FFFFFF), a thin navy border, and a navy search icon on the right. Organize content into three sections: 'Popular Topics' in a 2x2 grid with cards in muted corporate colors (navy, gray, teal, blue), 'FAQs' with expandable items in white cards with navy borders, and 'Contact Support' with horizontal cards for email, phone, and live chat, each with a navy icon. Use padding of 20px and spacing of 25px between sections. The primary color should be navy blue (#0D47A1) for buttons and icons, with dark gray (#455A64) for secondary text. Use a Column layout with a SingleChildScrollView.
